email_body: i like that feeling...as long as someone doesnt punch you in the gut. i'm going to san antonio at lunch today to play soccer so i just took the day off. catching up on 2 weeks of email. i know how to relax don't i From: Kim Ward/ENRON@enronXgate on 05/04/2001 09:34 AM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Every single muscle in my stomach is sore.
